hanzi-su-wiki:
縁

Значения

Связь, отношение, родство; край, кайма, оправа

Мнемоника

Гусеница шелкопряда, вырабатывающая особый сорт ниток 糸 — шифоновые. Имеет опушку из волосков, похожих на щетину кабана (свиньи 豕 с кабаньим рылом 彑). Оторочка, околыш, кайма. Родство видов шелкопряда.

Варианты

緣, 缘

heisig_constituent: affinity, thread, spiderman, broom, sow, pig
Keyword_KANJIDIC: affinity, relation, connection, edge, border, verge, brink
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: близость, связь, соединение, край, граница, грань, грань
koohiiStory1: There once was a lonely little pig that constantly followed Spiderman, always nuzzling his leg and oinking tenderly. Spiderman finally caved in and decided to keep the little pig under one condition: the pig was to take a broom and sweep up all of Spiderman´s leftover threads after having fought crime. The pig felt such affinity for Spiderman, he happily accepted—and did a good job too.
koohiiStory2: Certain people have an affinity for romantic partners who are handy with thread and a broom - it is of no consequence if they look like pigs. hmm...
kunYomi: ふち、ふちど.る、ゆかり、よすが、へり、えにし
jp_example_words:
縁(えん): chance, fate, destiny, relation, bonds, connection, karma
縁側(えんがわ): veranda, porch, balcony, open corridor
縁談(えんだん): marriage proposal, engagement
縁(ふち): (surrounding) edge
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There's a thread tying wolverine to a pig, balancing them over the edge of a cliff together.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture wolverine and a pig hanging precariously over the edge. One move the wrong way and they'll both go toppling over.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Suddenly, the pig squeals, pulls the thread, and sends them both over the edge. Straight to their end (えん).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you fall off the edge it'll be your end too. Always be safe and never get too close to any edges!
Ru_Meaning: affinity, relation, connection, edge, border, verge, brink
Ru_Words: Сравни: 緑 (みどり、リョク、ロク зелёный)
Ru_Radicals: 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), ヨ, 糸 (нить), 豕 (свинья)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the pig (豕) gives a yo (ヨ) because it's thread (糸) he has an affinity with
